mapper.select: select level, cateName, cateCode, cateCodeRef from item_category start with cateCodeRef is null connect by prior cateCode = cateCodeRef
mapper.insert: insert into mall_item(item_num, item_name, item_catecode, item_price, item_allnumber, item_summary, item_date, item_picture, item_thumbImg) values(ITEM_NUM_SEQ.nextval, #{item_name}, #{item_catecode},#{item_price}, #{item_allnumber}, #{item_summary}, sysdate, #{item_picture}, #{item_thumbImg})
mapper.select: select item_num, item_name, item_catecode ,item_type, item_size, item_gender, item_price, item_allnumber, item_summary, item_date, item_picture, item_thumbImg from mall_item order by item_num desc
mapper.update: update mall_item set item_name = #{item_name}, item_catecode = #{item_catecode}, item_price = #{item_price}, item_allnumber = #{item_allnumber}, item_summary = #{item_summary}, item_picture = #{item_picture}, item_thumbImg = #{item_thumbImg} where item_num = ${item_num}
